org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class MoDeLLaCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.MoDeLLaCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class MoDeLLaCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec
    A MoDeLLaCodec can parse a MoDeLLa XML file to an ω-automaton. To output an acceptable MoDeLLa XML file, the parameter "-n" is required to be passed to MoDeLLa.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
